channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: Image to Cartoon - 最好的在線AI漫畫家，免費的
item.description: ImagetoCartoon是一個在線人工智能卡通化器，可以將你的臉轉換成卡通或動漫風格。不僅可以製作卡通頭像，還可以自己製作表情符號。由最好的人工智能技術提供支持，你可以在幾秒鐘內將圖像轉換爲卡通。
item.content:encoded: ImagetoCartoon is an online AI cartoonizer that could convert your face to cartoon or anime style. Not only make cartoon avatars but also emoji yourself. Powered by the best AI technology, you can convert image to cartoon in seconds.

item.title: Glitché NFT Tool - 點擊幾下就可以創建NFT藝術
item.description: 新版本的Glitché是一個完美的NFT-藝術工具，它的glitch-filters是基於無法重現的隨機數據。從你的相機膠捲中最多有三個視頻的數據，或實驗實時記錄。
item.content:encoded: New version of Glitché is a perfect NFT-art tool with glitch-filters based on random data that cannot be recreated. Datamosh up to three videos from your camera roll or experiment with real-time recording.

item.title: HomeMovie - 一起創造回憶
item.description: HomeMovie讓人們重溫攝像機的懷舊情懷，並有了新的變化。與朋友一起創作和錄製。當你捕捉到這一時刻時，你會看到磁帶上每個人的所有剪輯都會出現。這是一種有趣的方式，可以一起創造回憶!
item.content:encoded: HomeMovie brings back the nostalgia of the Camcorder with a twist. Create and record together with friends. As you capture the moment, you see all clips from everyone on the tape come in as they happen. It's a fun way to create memories together!

item.title: Fugo TV Dashboards - 在電視屏幕上安全地分享商業智能數據
item.description: 到目前爲止，很少有辦法在整個組織中大規模地分享關鍵數據。電視儀表板讓你取代不必要的會議、中斷、電子郵件和鏈接共享，把你的數據放在工作場所的電視屏幕上讓所有人看到。
item.content:encoded: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.

item.title: Pokoy - 用於冥想的斐波那契計時器
item.description: 用於冥想的應用程序。它利用你對時間估計的認知偏差，鼓勵你更經常地進行冥想。
item.content:encoded: App for Meditation. It uses your cognitive biases of time estimates and encourages you to meditate more often.

item.title: YouTube Transcripts 2.0 - SEO優化的YouTube成績單，現在只需點擊一下就可以了
item.description: 如果沒有SEO，你不會指望在谷歌上獲得高排名。- 視頻轉錄對於YT算法知道你的視頻是關於什麼的至關重要。自動生成的不算數。- 獲得快速、準確和便宜的轉錄，讓你獲得你應得的瀏覽量。
item.content:encoded: You wouldn't expect to rank highly on Google without SEO. - Video transcriptions are crucial for the YT algorithm to know what your video is about. Auto-generated ones don't count. - Get fast, accurate and cheap transcriptions to get you the views you deserve.

item.title: Elecjet Apollo Ultra - 最快充電的電源箱
item.description: 介紹阿波羅Ultra，世界上最快的充電電源。由於石墨烯的增強，這款10,000mAh的電源銀行在27分鐘內就能以100W的功率自我充電。你甚至可以用高達85W的功率爲你所有的設備快速充電。
item.content:encoded: Introducing Apollo Ultra, The World’s Fastest Charging Power Bank. Thanks to graphene enhancement, this 10,000mAh power bank charges itself at 100W in just under 27 minutes. You can even fast charge all of your devices with up to 85W of power.

item.title: BikeSpot - 我們幫助你探索我們的世界，認識冒險家
item.description: BikeSpot.fr是一個用於分享和下載GPS自行車路線的衆包應用。我們的使命。讓騎行者發現未曾探索過的地方，並將他們聯繫在一起。在BikeSpot上尋找您的下一次騎行
item.content:encoded: BikeSpot.fr is a crowdsourced app for sharing and downloading GPS bike routes. Our mission: Allow riders discovering the unexplored and connect them together. Find your next ride on BikeSpot!

item.title: D2C Hunt - 找到數百個你可以合作的D2C品牌
item.description: D2C Hunt幫助你找到數以百計的品牌 印度D2C品牌（直接面向消費者的品牌），你可以與之合作! 節省了你數百個小時的谷歌搜索和滾動瀏覽Instagram的時間。
item.content:encoded: D2C Hunt helps you find hundreds of brands Indian D2C brands ( Direct to consumer brands) you can collaborate with!! Saves you hundreds of hours of googling and scrolling through Instagram.

item.title: Newsly 2.0 - 用自然的人聲讀出最熱門的新聞和文章
item.description: Newsly擷取了網絡上最熱門的話題，並以自然的聲音進行解讀。現在你可以關注你能想到的任何話題，無論是NFT、Metaverse還是卡戴珊家族 整個網絡都變得可聽了! 現在還提供播客、閱讀模式和天氣。
item.content:encoded: Newsly picks up the most trending topics on the web and reads them in a natural voice. Now you can follow any topic you can think of, be it NFT, Metaverse, or The Kardashians! The entire web becomes listenable! Now also with podcasts, read mode and weather.

item.title: Outlet Finance - 用DeFi取代你的銀行賬戶
item.description: 奧特萊斯金融應用程序允許你用一個簡單和易於使用的加密貨幣錢包取代你的銀行賬戶，該錢包是爲非加密貨幣人士設計的。
item.content:encoded: The Outlet Finance app allows your to replace your bank account with a simple and easy to use crypto wallet that is designed for the non crypto person.

item.title: Fugue 3.0 - 新鮮的音樂，讓你的視頻變得很有活力
item.description: 爲視頻尋找合適的音樂可能是一個挑戰。而購買適當的許可證也是很棘手的。這就是爲什麼新的《賦格》有5倍的精選曲目和簡單的定價。因此，你可以在預算範圍內獲得更多的音樂。
item.content:encoded: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.

item.title: Presentation Camera - 在你的Mac上播放實時視頻
item.description: 通過在桌面上展示自己，使你的演講或屏幕錄像更有吸引力。錄製YouTube視頻，從相機鏡頭中刪除背景，而不需要綠屏。把焦點放在你的臉上，就像iPad的中心舞臺，但在Mac上。
item.content:encoded: Make your presentations or screen recordings more engaging by showing yourself on your desktop. Record a YouTube video, remove background from camera footage without requiring a green screen. Keep focus on your face just like iPad's centre stage, but on Mac.

item.title: WishTender - 創作者--從你的粉絲那裏獲得禮物!
item.description: 爲內容創作者提供最安全、最靈活的通用微信平臺。輕鬆地列出項目並從粉絲那裏獲得資金。使用WishTender，你可以。✅ 爲你的禮物獲得現金 ✅ 發送照片感謝信息 ✅ 34+個國家的性工作者友好!
item.content:encoded: The safest and most flexible universal wishlist for content creators. Easily list items and get funds from fans. With WishTender you can: ✅ Get cash for your gifts ✅ Send photo thank-you messages ✅ 34+ countries Sex Worker Friendly!

item.title: AVDA: Find Jobs & Careers - 尋找和申請工作的一種簡單、無簡歷的方式
item.description: AVDA是一個移動應用程序，它通過將簡歷轉化爲易於理解的數據來簡化工作安置，這些數據可以被過濾和搜索，同時給用戶帶來類似現代約會的體驗，同時幫助減少停機時間並節省公司的資金。
item.content:encoded: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.

item.title: MindGarden - 有趣的、簡單的、真正能堅持的冥想
item.description: 通過每天的感恩、情緒檢查和冥想，讓你每天都有1%的幸福感，你會真正堅持下去。種植/收集美麗的植物，並在每個月的月底培養一個美麗的日曆（你的心靈花園）。
item.content:encoded: Get 1% happier every day through daily gratitudes, mood checks & meditation that you'll actually stick with. Grow/collect beautiful plants and at the end of each month cultivate a beautiful calendar (your MindGarden).

item.title: Glitch Image Generator - 一個生成工具來創建突變的圖像
item.description: 一個生成工具，允許你創建和保存獨特的突變圖像。⚡️
item.content:encoded: A generative tool which allows you to create and save unique glitchy images. ⚡️

item.title: Clips by Riverside.fm - 您只需錄製一次，我們就能幫助您接觸到所有人
item.description: 夾子是一種將你的長篇內容轉化爲多篇短篇內容的方法。可在社交媒體上輕鬆分享，以同樣的努力接觸更多的人。您只需錄製一次，我們就能幫助您接觸到所有人
item.content:encoded: Clips is a way to transform your long-form content into multiple pieces of short-form content. Easily sharable on social media to reach more people with the same effort. You record once, we help you reach everyone!

item.title: Xtra Clipboard - 用剪貼板提高你的生產力
item.description: Xtra Clipboard是一個對開發者友好的剪貼板管理器，超級快速且易於使用。你在設備中複製的所有東西都可以在剪貼板歷史中找到。它能聰明地將文本、網站和代碼片段分別分類。
item.content:encoded: Xtra Clipboard is a developer-friendly clipboard manager that is super fast and easy to use. Everything you copy in your device can be found in the clipboard history. It smartly sorts texts, websites, and code snippets separately.

item.title: Quest NFT Platform - 2分鐘內將你的社交媒體帖子免費轉換成NFTs
item.description: 我們已經建立了一個超級簡單的方法，讓創作者、品牌和社區直接從你的社交媒體渠道免費創建NFT，並且在2分鐘內完成！我們的目標是讓創作者、品牌和社區創建NFT。
item.content:encoded: We have built a super-easy way for Creators, Brands, and Communities to create NFTs straight from your social media channels for free and in under 2 minutes!

item.title: Bouncebuster by Overloop - 實時電子郵件驗證器
item.description: Bouncebuster是一個實時的電子郵件驗證器，可以幫助你對抗退信並提高電子郵件的交付能力。在發送前驗證電子郵件地址，保護你的域名聲譽。
item.content:encoded: Bouncebuster is a real-time email verifier that helps you fight bounce & increase email deliverability. Verify email addresses before sending and protect your domain reputation.

item.title: Hexometer 3.0 - 最全面的網站監控應用
item.description: 獲得24/7的安心，並在網站問題影響你的業務之前抓住它們。
item.content:encoded: Get 24/7 peace of mind and catch website issues before they impact your business.

item.title: Slidekick - 由GPT-3提供的AI驅動的幻燈片生成器
item.description: Slidekick是你的個人AI演示助理。它問你一些關於你想做的幻燈片的問題，然後爲你創建它。這是一個測試版本。它有一個用例：創建一個初創企業的投籃板。更多的用例將很快被添加。
item.content:encoded: Slidekick is your personal AI presentation assistant. It asks you a few questions about the slide deck you want to make and then creates it for you. This is a beta version. It has 1 use case: creating a startup pitch deck. More use cases will be added soon.

item.title: Monq AIOps platform - 世界上第一個基於拓撲結構的AI-Ops自動化平臺
item.description: Monq是世界上唯一用於自動數據收集和分析的自我託管的免費平臺。它將你的可觀察性轉化爲主動監測，幫助IT團隊防止可能的中斷，同時最大限度地減少成本和努力。
item.content:encoded: Monq is the world’s only self-hosted freemium platform for automated data collection and analysis. It turns your observability into proactive monitoring, helping IT teams prevent possible outages while minimizing costs and efforts.

item.title: Search Party by Something Good - 一起挑選聖誕電影的一個有趣、快速的方法
item.description: Something Good的Search Party使一起尋找聖誕電影變得有趣而快速。
item.content:encoded: Search Party by Something Good makes finding a Christmas movie together fun and fast.

item.title: Herd Social - 拋棄高光片，尋找真正的朋友
item.description: Herd是一個社交平臺，幫助你找到朋友。每週，我們通過成員的共同興趣在羣聊和照片中進行匹配。我們有0個指標，讓你輕鬆地表達自己的真實想法。該應用程序在全球範圍內免費使用，適用於iOS。
item.content:encoded: Herd is a social platform that helps you find friends. Each week, we match members through their shared interests in a group chat & photo feed. We have 0 metrics, making it easy to express yourself authentically. The app is free to use globally on iOS.

item.title: FlixGem by Polymer Search - 立即發現Netflix的頂級隱藏景點
item.description: 我們建立了尋找Netflix上隱藏的寶石的最佳方式： 💯 只包括最高評級的電影和節目。沒有垃圾 🔍 探索數以千計的屬性的唯一方法 🎥 找到高評級的內容，而不是那麼知名 使用Polymer Search，以零代碼建立。
item.content:encoded: We built the best way to find hidden gems on Netflix: 💯 Only top-rated movies and shows are included. No junk 🔍 The only way to explore thousands of attributes 🎥 Find highly-rated content that isn't so well-known Built with zero code using Polymer Search.

item.title: App Marketer's Playbook for iOS 15 - 通過可操作的洞察力增加你的應用收入
item.description: 我們的最新指南充滿了來自行業領先公司和專家的見解，涵蓋了你需要知道的關於App Store中移動增長新時代的一切。
item.content:encoded: Filled with insights from industry-leading companies and experts, our latest guide covers everything you need to know about the new era of mobile growth in the App Store.

item.title: Tact - 一個簡單的聊天應用程序
item.description: Tact是一個簡單的原生聊天應用，適用於iOS、iPadOS和macOS。它與iCloud一起工作，不需要你創建一個賬戶--這意味着它是私密的，沒有不需要的連接。
item.content:encoded: Tact is a simple native chat app for iOS, iPadOS and macOS. It works with iCloud and does not require you to create an account — this means it is private and free of unwanted connections.

item.title: alertss - 增加轉化率的簡單彈出窗口
item.description: 簡潔永遠是贏家。創建微妙但強大的彈出窗口，在不破壞用戶體驗的情況下增加轉換率。獲得更多線索。創造更多的FOMO。只需點擊幾下就能提高轉換率。
item.content:encoded: Simplicity always wins. Create subtle, but powerful popups that increase conversions without ruining user experience. Get more leads. Create more FOMO. Increase conversions in a few clicks.

item.title: PunkScape Builder - 在Twitter、OpenSea、Discord上建立並擁有自己的旗幟
item.description: 這種不平衡是顯而易見的。#PFP（個人資料照片）NFTs無處不在。#PFB（個人簡介橫幅）是下一個前沿領域。PunkScapes是存儲在以太坊區塊鏈上的10.000個獨特景觀的集合。作爲Twitter、Discord和OpenSea的橫幅非常完美。
item.content:encoded: The imbalance is obvious: #PFP (profile photo) NFTs are everywhere. #PFBs (profile banners) are the next frontier. PunkScapes are a collection of 10.000 unique landscapes stored on the Ethereum Blockchain. Perfect as Twitter, Discord and OpenSea banners.

item.title: Vmaker Learners Hub - 從定製的視頻中學習新的軟件技能
item.description: 一個免費平臺，擁有從YouTube上精心挑選的不同軟件的最佳教程。學習者現在可以找到最好的視頻，而不必滾動瀏覽多個視頻，創作者可以增加他們的內容的視頻覆蓋率。
item.content:encoded: A free platform that has the best tutorials for different software hand-picked from YouTube. Learners can now find the best videos without having to scroll through multiple videos and creators can increase their video reach for their content.

item.title: ColorHuddle - 帶有實時預覽的即用型調色板
item.description: 滿足ColorHuddle - 一個免費的11個手工製作的、隨時可用的調色板集合，並有一個實時登陸頁面的例子。只需點擊頁面上的任何元素即可複製其顏色🌈。
item.content:encoded: Meet ColorHuddle – a free collection of 11 hand-crafted, ready-to-use color palettes with a live landing page example. Simply click on any element on the page to copy its color 🌈

item.title: SamosaBot by Threado - 在你的社區增長感激之情的Slackbot
item.description: 感恩是我們總是喜歡感受到更多的東西，並且總是覺得給予更多的東西很好。那麼，爲什麼不使它更容易做到呢？我們製作了這個免費的Slackbot來幫助做到這一點。Threado的SamosaBot是一種有趣的、簡單的方式，可以在你的Slack社區中表達感激之情。
item.content:encoded: Gratitude is that thing we always love to feel more of & always feels great to give more of. So why not make it easier to do? We made this FREE Slackbot to help do that. SamosaBot by Threado is a fun, simple way to give gratitude in your Slack community.

item.title: Ambire Wallet - 加快你的DeFi體驗並實現氣體管理自動化
item.description: Ambire錢包是第一個DeFi加密貨幣錢包，結合了強大的功能和易用性，解決了DeFi的常見痛點。可在以太坊、Polygon、Avalanche和BSC上使用。
item.content:encoded: Ambire Wallet is the first DeFi cryptocurrency wallet that combines power with ease of use, solving common pain points of DeFi. Available on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche and BSC.

item.title: Get Funded with Finmark - 與幾十位頂級投資者配對
item.description: Finmark已經與全球數十家最好的早期投資者合作，幫助創始人更快地獲得資金。將你的演講稿上傳到Finmark，並與Bessemer、Village Global、Draper & Associates等投資者進行匹配。
item.content:encoded: Finmark has partnered with dozens of the best early-stage investors across the globe to help founders get funded faster. Upload your pitch deck into Finmark and get matched with investors like Bessemer, Village Global, Draper & Associates, and more.

item.title: Modern Data Stack - 一個平臺就能解決關於現代數據棧的所有問題
item.description: ⭐️ 塑造現代數據棧的公司和類別 📚 世界頂級公司的數據棧 📖 獲取該領域最新信息的資源 🛠 數據工程方面的工作
item.content:encoded: A platform for everything you need to know about the Modern Data Stack ⭐️ Companies & Categories shaping the Modern Data Stack 📚 Data stacks of the world's top companies 📖 Resources to get updates on the latest in this space 🛠 Jobs in data engineering

item.title: Crypto-as-a-service by Mudrex - 向你的客戶提供加密貨幣服務，而不需要管理費
item.description: 通過Mudrex的加密貨幣即服務平臺，金融技術企業、超級應用程序、投資組合管理服務等可以爲其客戶提供簡單而安全的加密貨幣風險，而不必擔心合規性和技術問題。
item.content:encoded: With Mudrex’s Crypto-as-a-Service platform, fintech enterprises, super apps, portfolio management services, etc. can provide simple yet secure crypto exposure to their customers without worrying about the compliances and the technology.

item.title: Happyō - 通過現實生活中的行動來團結人們的社會平臺
item.description: Happyō是一個全新的社交體驗--視頻平臺，通過現實生活中的行動將人們團結起來。要獲得邀請函，請從AppStore下載該應用程序，並按此鏈接註冊一個賬戶：https://ppa.happyo.app/share/invite/CQMTTD32
item.content:encoded: Happyō is a completely new social experience - video platform uniting people through real life actions. To get your INVITE, download the app from the AppStore and press this LINK to register an account: https://ppa.happyo.app/share/invite/CQMTTD32

item.title: Simfolio - 預測你的未來淨資產，保持對你的財務狀況的關注
item.description: Simfolio是一種工具，它向你展示你所有的投資賬戶將如何共同增長，讓你瞭解你未來的淨資產。在預測的同時，該應用還讓你將你的賬戶表現與基準進行比較。
item.content:encoded: Simfolio is a tool that shows you how all your investment accounts will grow together to give you an idea of your future net worth. Along with projections, the app lets you compare your account performance to benchmarks.

item.title: Apple Music Wrapped - 爲蘋果音樂用戶提供的Spotify Wrapped。
item.description: 如果你像我一樣是蘋果音樂的用戶，在Spotify Wrapped季節🥲，你會感到被冷落。是的，我們有Replay，但我想我們都想要更多。因此，在8天內，我建立了一個更有趣和更深入的東西😁希望你能喜歡!
item.content:encoded: If you're an Apple Music user like me, you felt left out during Spotify Wrapped season🥲. Yes we had Replay but I think we all wanted a bit more. So in 8 days I built something much more fun and in depth😁Hope you enjoy!

item.title: CoFinds - 用200個字符介紹你的創業公司並找到你的聯合創始人
item.description: 通過在200個字符或更短的時間內介紹你的創業公司，尋找聯合創始人、創始團隊或其他專業人士。
item.content:encoded: Find cofounders, founding team or other professionals by pitching your startup in 200 characters or less.

item.title: mmmotif - 等距三維模式的SVG生成器
item.description: 一個SVG生成器，由於採用了等距設計，可以很容易地生成具有3D外觀和感覺的形狀圖案。
item.content:encoded: An SVG generator that makes it easy to generate patterns of shapes that have a 3D look and feel, thanks to isometric design.

item.title: Ground Zero - 將macOS應用程序重置爲原始安裝狀態
item.description: 在不刪除應用程序的情況下，將應用程序恢復到其首次安裝時的狀態。修復問題並取回默認設置。通過清理通常在卸載應用程序時留下的數據來回收磁盤空間。
item.content:encoded: Return an app to the state it was in when it was first installed, without deleting the app. Fix issues and get back the default settings. Reclaim disk space by cleaning up data that would normally be left behind when uninstalling an app.

item.title: Feedir - 每週有數以千計的工作推文的贊數低於5。
item.description: Feedir讓你輕鬆找到Twitter上的招聘信息。只需點擊一個按鈕，你就會看到今天招聘的公司的推文。
item.content:encoded: Feedir makes it easy to find job listings on Twitter. From the click of a button you will be shown tweets from companies hiring today.

item.title: Sensorpad - cron作業和數據管道的監控和報告工具
item.description: 基於事件的💡監控和📈報告工具，用於根據你設置的規則進行cron作業、數據管道、CI和CD構建。你幾乎不需要任何編程知識來設置這種監控。
item.content:encoded: Event-based 💡 monitoring and 📈 reporting tool for cron jobs, data pipelines,CI & CD builds according to the rules you set up. You hardly need any programming knowledge to set up such monitoring.

item.title: Crypto for Charity - 捐贈加密貨幣，節省稅收，做出貢獻
item.description: 今天，絕大多數慈善機構都沒有接受加密貨幣捐贈的技術能力。Crypto for Charity解鎖了進入2萬億美元以上的加密貨幣市場的機會，使其能夠安全、快速、省稅地捐贈給美國基本上任何501(c)3慈善機構。
item.content:encoded: Today, the vast majority of charities have no technical capacity to accept crypto donations. Crypto for Charity unlocks access to the $2+ trillion crypto market by making it safe, quick, and tax-efficient to donate to essentially any 501(c)3 charity in the US.

item.title: iStock inside InVideo - 在InVideo中以極低的成本獲得高質量的素材
item.description: iStock提供了500多萬條優質視頻，現在可以在InVideo中使用。InVideo使用戶創建B-rolls或使用素材視頻的過程變得更加簡單和便宜。
item.content:encoded: iStock provides 5M+ premium stock videos and it’s now available inside InVideo. InVideo makes the user journey to create B-rolls or to just use stock videos 10X easier and cheaper

item.title: EduDo 2.0 - 基於視頻的討論平臺
item.description: EduDo是一個視頻討論平臺
item.content:encoded: EduDo is a video discussion platform

item.title: 5 Minutes Daily Sketching Community - 每天寫生5分鐘，感受創意和快樂
item.description: 每天只需5分鐘的寫生，就能讓你的創造力得到發揮。🎨 初學者、業餘愛好者的理想選擇 🥳 4000多人的社區，讓你保持動力 🚀 排行榜、連勝追蹤 💡 新的想法、討論和活動
item.content:encoded: Let your creativity flow with just 5 minutes of daily sketching. 👩‍🎨 Ideal for beginners, amateurs and hobbyists 🥳 A community of 4000+ folks to keep you motivated 🚀 Leaderboard, streak tracking 💡 New ideas, discussion and events
